content.raw:
I don't think this ticket is invalid. The problem actually lies in `gazebo/sdf/interface/CMakeLists.txt`. For some reason, in the call to `target_link_libraries`, the variables ${urdfdom_LDFLAGS} and ${console_bridge_LDFLAGS} are added which causes the invalid linker line. I don't really understand why the LDFLAGS are added there but I doubt that they should be.  

 I'll attach a patch.
content.html:
I don't think this ticket is invalid. The problem actually lies in gazebo/sdf/interface/CMakeLists.txt. For some reason, in the call to target_link_libraries, the variables ${urdfdom_LDFLAGS} and ${console_bridge_LDFLAGS} are added which causes the invalid linker line. I don't really understand why the LDFLAGS are added there but I doubt that they should be.

I'll attach a patch.
